sn4.4:1.2: At one time the Buddha was staying near Benares, in the deer park at Isipatana.
sn4.4:1.3: There the Buddha addressed the mendicants,
sn4.4:2.1: “Mendicants, I have attained and realized supreme freedom through proper attention and proper effort.
sn4.4:2.2: You too should attain and realize supreme freedom through proper attention and proper effort.”
sn4.4:2.3: Then Māra the Wicked went up to the Buddha and addressed him in verse:
